text: But a prophet of Yahweh was there, whose name was Oded: and he went out to meet the army that came to Samaria, and said to them, â€œBehold, because Yahweh, the God of your fathers, was angry with Judah, he has delivered them into your hand, and you have slain them in a rage which has reached up to heaven.
